original_text: Isaac himself also believed God. As a result of his faith, he asked God to bless his sons, Jacob and Esau. He trusted that God would help them in the future time.
korean_text: 믿음으로 이삭은 장차 있을 일에 대하여 야곱과 에서에게 축복하였으며

sentences.original_text: As a result of his faith,
he asked God to bless his sons,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께 자기 아들들을 축복해달라고 구했습니다,

sentences.original_text: He trusted that God would help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께서 그들을 도와주실 것이라고 믿었습니다
